newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Scania says wins Egypt bus chassis order.
newsitem.headline: Scania says wins Egypt bus chassis order.

text.p: Swedish truck and bus maker Scania said on Monday it won an order for 360 bus chassis from Ghabbour Egypt.
The chassis will be delivered at the end of the year and in 1998, Scania said in a statement which did not disclose the value of the order.
This is the third order from Ghabbour Egypt in a short period of time. Since November last year Scania has received orders for 750 bus chassis from Egypt, it said.
"The large deliveries of buses to Egypt this year means that the country will become one of Scania's large bus markets in 1997," Rolf Teljeby, marketing manager for Scania Buses & Coaches, said.
"Through this order we will strengthen our position as one of the leading bus brands in Egypt," he said.
The Egyptian bus market is growing after decreasing for some years, the company said.
